item.title: Security Onion 2020 - The hunt
item.description: I’ve done another couple of videos about Security Onion focusing on how I can use The hunt to look for anomalies in network traffic. As for the previous video I give a disclaimer: I’m not a Security Onion expert, and those video are meant to keep track of my progress and to help others to familiarize with the tool. In first video I start from an alert from Strelka and then proceed to identify possible compromised machine in the network as well as finding external malicious IPs.
